aphorism: "only those who wander find new paths"

about.body: It is Necla. I like to create and develop user interfaces with high user experience. That is why I am a front-end developer now.
about.details: I have almost two years of full-time experience, based in London. I enjoy new frameworks the most, like React and Vue. I love details and different than the majority, I like to style.

projects.body: and these are some of my works.

descriptions.mundus: Mundus is an application where you can get short informations about the countries and save where you have been to.
descriptions.vygr: Vygr is a social media platform that you can plan and share your trips. It is still not released yet, but you can follow us!
descriptions.hermes: Hermes is a software that warns drivers with an alarm when they are distracted and help them analyze their distractions via the web application. With this project, as a team of four, we have won the second place in Metu Ceng Demo Day 2020.
descriptions.movie search: Here, you can search movies and get informations about them.
descriptions.connect four: Connect four is a board game played with two in which the first to get 4 in a row wins.

designs.body: I am not a professional but I just like it.
designs.helpyourdiabetes: Help Your Diabetes - Home Page Design

contact.body: Get in touch with me if you would like to learn more.
